title: Add About section, white border to header logo, and logo mockup to portfolio

acceptanceCriteria: About section is positioned between Hero and Services sections
Section contains the exact bio text provided by the user
Styling matches the navy and gold luxury aesthetic
Section is responsive and maintains proper spacing

requirements.summary: Add white border to KC logo image in Header component
acceptanceCriteria: KC logo in header has a visible white border
Border style is consistent with the overall design aesthetic
Logo remains properly aligned with navigation items

file_operations.description: Add a white border to the KC logo image element in the Header component using Tailwind CSS border utilities (e.g., border-2 border-white or border-4 border-white). Ensure the border is visible against the navy background and the logo maintains proper alignment with the navigation buttons.

requirements.summary: Add logo mockup image to portfolio gallery at the top with white border
acceptanceCriteria: Logo mockup image appears in the portfolio gallery
Image is positioned at or near the top of the gallery
Image has the same white border as other portfolio items
Image maintains responsive behavior in the masonry layout

file_operations.description: Add the uploaded logo mockup image 'WhatsApp Image 2026-02-21 at 10.31.00 AM.jpeg' showing KC logo on mug and t-shirt to the portfolio gallery. Position it at the top of the images array so it appears first in the masonry layout. Apply the same white border styling (border-4 border-white) and hover effects as existing portfolio images to maintain visual consistency.
